meanings.definition: A type of vehicle or structure in which the outer skin carries all or a major part of the stresses.
meanings.sent1: The monocoques of the spaceship protected the astronauts during reentry.
meanings.sent2: The racing car's monocoques provided both strength and aerodynamic efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The monocoques of the submarine were so tough, even the sea creatures couldn't dent them!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like the monocoques of a fortress, shielding her from any doubts.
meanings.sent5: The monocoques of the bridge stood out against the sky, a testament to modern engineering.
